long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using this plugin, the operation of Google Search becomes smoother with shortcut keys. You can use the j/k keys to move up and down through search results one by one, and you can also open the search result that is currently in focus with a shortcut. 

## Shortcut keys

- j : Navigate to the next search item
- k : Navigate to the previous search item
- v : Open the searched item in the current tab
- o : Open the item under the cursor, or any pinned item, in a new tab
- p : Pin the searched item
